Impute.definition: to consider or calculate as a value or cost
Impute.origin: [ a benefit from the use of the car]

1.definition: to consider or calculate as a value or cost (as for taxation)to reckon as an actual thing [ a benefit from the use of the car]

2.definition: to direct (payment) to principal or interest

3.definition: to attribute to a party esp. because of responsibility for another [ knowledge to his corporate superior]
